ProductInfo.Features:
Image Sensor: 1/3" Sharp Color CCD; Signal System: NTSC; Effective Pixels: 500(H) x582(V); Horizontal Resolution: 700 TV Lines
Minimum Illumination: 0 LUX (IR on); Scanning Area: 2:1 Interlace; S/N Ratio >48~52dB; Electronic Shutter: 1/60 ~ 1/100,000 sec
Video Output: BNC, 1.0Vp-p, 75ohms; Supply Voltage: DC 12V (Recommend 1Amp); Operating Temperature 14°F to 122°F;
White Balance/ AGC/ Backlight Compensation: Auto; Mounting Lens: 2.8-10mm Vari-Focal; Synchronous Syste: Internal; Gamma Corrections: 0.45
IR Distance: 120 feets; IR Lamps: 42 LEDs; View Angle: 38~90 Degree; Water resistance: IP 65
ProductInfo.Name: Atrix Night Vision Weatherproof Bullet Camera w/ 2.8-10mm Vari-Focal Lens IR Indoor/Outdoor Security Surveillance CCTV
